Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Seems to act as a signaling molecule involved in the maintenance of iron homeostasis.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Highly expressed in the liver and to a much lesser extent in the heart. Also expressed in pancreas.
